mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTRING(temp.rate, 4) as rate, temp.cnt FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN sr.auctionPrice=0 AND sr.bidPrice > 0 THEN '01*涨停' WHEN sr.increaseRate>=0.07 AND sr.auctionPrice!=0 THEN '02*> 7%' WHEN sr.increaseRate>=0.05 AND sr.increaseRate < 0.07 THEN '03*5%~7%' WHEN sr.increaseRate>=0.03 AND sr.increaseRate < 0.05 THEN '04*3%~5%' WHEN sr.increaseRate>=0 AND sr.increaseRate < 0.03 THEN '05*0%~3%' WHEN sr.increaseRate>=-0.03 AND sr.increaseRate < 0 THEN '06*-3%~0%' WHEN sr.increaseRate>=-0.05 AND sr.increaseRate < -0.03 THEN '07*-3%~-5%' WHEN sr.increaseRate>=-0.07 AND sr.increaseRate < 0.05 THEN '08*-7%~-5%' WHEN sr.increaseRate < -0.07 AND sr.bidPrice!=0 THEN '09*> -7%' WHEN sr.bidPrice=0 AND sr.auctionPrice>0 THEN '10*跌停' ELSE '11*停牌' END AS rate,COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM stock_realtime sr GROUP BY rate ORDER BY rate) temp
